properties.name: dukeops.buildTime
properties.description: Timestamp of the build when the application artifact was created. Used to identify the exact nightly or CI build running in an environment.

properties.name: dukeops.mail.from
properties.description: Sender address shown in outgoing emails (e.g. noreply@example.com).

properties.name: dukeops.instance.admin
properties.description: Email address of the instance admin (e.g. `admin@example.com`).
